Posts.Content: Thanks will give them a go.x
Posts.Title: Post Mastectomy Swimwear

Posts.Content: Hi all My lovely sister bout her and I a holiday to Portugal this April for my 40th Birthday.No husbands No kids just us two.I am finding it really hard to find a really nice post Mastectomy swimsuit.Most of the ones I have looked at online are very old fashioned.There doesn’t seem to be much of a selection for the younger woman.Can anybody give me any advise as to where to look for a good one.Thanks in advance CD41 x
Posts.Title: Post Mastectomy Swimwear

Posts.Content: Optimistic,Thankyou for the hug Also.Our two youngest children play football so have a competition on Sunday,so at least that will pass it a bit.x

Posts.Content: Thankyou seaspirit44,Just need to keep busy the next few days.Will keep you all posted x
Posts.Title: Worried Sick

Posts.Content: seaspirit44,From what I have read you have been through the mill as well.Warm hugs going your way too.xx
Posts.Title: Worried Sick

Posts.Content: Recently found what looks like an indent/shadow on my left reconstructed breast.Worried Sick as this is how my second breast cancer presented.Have contacted the BCN who has gave me an appointment for Wed 16th May at 10am.Have had IDC breast cancer twice,first time was in 2010 at age 32 resulting in bilateral mastectomy’s with tram reconstruction.The second time was in 2015 age 37 which again presented as an indent/shadow under my right reconstructed breast.Had to have my right reconstructed breast removed completely.Both times recieving chemo,radio,herceptin and Tamoxifen and now on Anastrozole,So you can see why I’m so worried.My mind is running away with thought like,what if it’s back,could I cope with losing my hair again,chemo etc.....
Posts.Title: Worried Sick

Posts.Content: Hi Sandy59,I really appreciate your friendship hug.Im currently sitting here alone while our children are at school.At the minute I’m just clock watching wishing it was next Wednesday.Fingers crossed I won’t hear the C word for a third time.You know what they say third times a charm!But hopefully not in this case.Will keep you posted.x
Posts.Title: Worried Sick

Posts.Content: Thanks Eddiboy will keep you posted x

Posts.Content: Shellian,Thankyou.Will feel better when the children get home from school.Too much time on my hands today.x
